contest-event.event-date:
Oct. 5, 2013 D West Wales BBA Festival Contest (Second Section)
West Wales BBA Festival Contest (Second Section) 20 Own Choice Test Piece Contest West Wales BBA Festival Contest west-wales-bba-festival-contest-second-section
None
Burry Port, Carmarthenshire, Wales, UK Best Instrumentalist: Nia Morris, Soprano, Gwaun Cae Gurwen [originally given incorrectly as Nia Griffiths] Prizes - 1st £200, 2nd £125, 3rd £100. 8 bands competed
Oct. 6, 2013, 2:57 p.m. July 4, 2020, 12:25 p.m.
1 Goodwick Brass Matthew Jenkins Purcell Variations [Downie]
2 Parc and Dare Band Andrew Jones Mountain Views
3 Gwaun-cae-Gurwen Band Malcolm Read Portrait of a City [Sparke]
4 Crwbin Silver Band Colin Hogg A Salford Sinfonietta
5 Briton Ferry Band Christian Jenkins Kaleidoscope [Sparke]
6 Ynyshir Band Gary Davies The Dark Side of the Moon
7 Ammanford Silver Band Glyn Davies A Malvern Suite
8 Cross Keys Silver Band Kerry Bowden A Gallimaufry Suite
